means: <主美>躲躲猫（一种把脸一隐一现以逗小孩的游戏）

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...,之所以如今的DVD封套依然沿用这个让人一头雾水的海报方案，大概是Veronica Lake当年的“躲猫猫”(peekaboo)发型(弯曲着半遮住脸)实在过于风靡。
49. umbrella （雨伞）48. peekaboo （遮脸游戏）47. delicacy （精致）

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.(as a noun): from the verbpeek + boo

encyclopedia.content: 品牌故事 贝卡布是克缇直销事业体旗下的品牌。长期以来，贝卡布都致力于打造充满斗志、想往美丽、关注时尚、勇于尝试的Peekaboo girl的品牌形象，贝卡布的理念，也已经成功地受到广大爱美女性的追捧，成为当今流行趋势的风向标，产品包括了彩妆、护肤以及SPA美氧护手护甲系列，成为时尚女孩闪亮登场的秘密武器！品牌档案 中文名：贝卡布 外文名：peekaboo； 所属公司：克缇； 彩妆产品 peekaboo慕司眼影膏； peekaboo夜精灵亮闪粉

entry.tran: 藏猫猫（逗小孩儿的一种游戏）
entry.def: also peekaboo. Peekaboo is a game you play with babies in which you cover your face with your hands or hide behind something and then suddenly show your face, saying 'peekaboo!'

means.word_mean: 1. a game played with young children; you hide your face and suddenly reveal it as you say Boo!

auth_sentence.content: Here's to you Kim Peek and your peekaboo world of wonders!
auth_sentence.res_content: Here's to you Kim Peek and your peekaboo world of wonders!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Here's to you Kim Peek and your peekaboo world of wonders!

auth_sentence.content: I'm at home playing peekaboo in my room with my little brother, Jean.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'm at home playing peekaboo in my room with my little brother, Jean.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'm at home playing peekaboo in my room with my little brother, Jean.
